posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have for sale a T206 Walter Johnson portrait. It's a beautiful card , but it is short, top-to-bottom. It is trimmed on the bottom edge. I want you to be aware of that.

But this is a beautiful card with bold, bright colors and no creases. It also has a Sovereign back. I am asking $825 or best offer. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order, but I will accept a check or Paypal, if a money order is a problem.

You can contact me directly at:cy@cyscards.com if you would like to buy it.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-230b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-230rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
